dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, you know, big news coming out of, uh, Mastercard, over in Central Asia this week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you know, big news coming out of, uh, Mastercard, over in Central Asia this week.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanzhar Zhamalov appointed as the new Country Manager of Mastercard in Kazakhstan and Central Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they've just appointed Sanzhar Zhamalov as their new Country Manager for Kazakhstan and Central Asia. That's, like, a pretty significant role.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they've just appointed Sanzhar Zhamalov as their new Country Manager for Kazakhstan and Central Asia. That's, like, a pretty significant role.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanzhar Zhamalov appointed as the new Country Manager of Mastercard in Kazakhstan and Central Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's huge! So he's covering Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan, right? That's quite a bit of territory.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's huge! So he's covering Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan, right? That's quite a bit of territory.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His area of responsibility includes Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan and Turkmenistan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And, uh, he's not new to the game either. Previously, he was the Head of the ING Bank N.V. office there. So, like, a lot of experience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And, uh, he's not new to the game either. Previously, he was the Head of the I N G Bank N V office there. So, like, a lot of experience.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, Mr. Zhamalov was the Head of Representative Office of ING Bank N.V. in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so he's coming in with, um, some serious banking cred. His main task, I hear, is to really stimulate growth and strengthen cooperation with banks and governments.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so he's coming in with, um, some serious banking cred. His main task, I hear, is to really stimulate growth and strengthen cooperation with banks and governments.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main task of Mr. Zhamalov will be to stimulate the companys business growth in the countries of the region, strengthening cooperation with partners banks and government agencies, development new partnerships.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, absolutely. And he sounds pretty excited about it too, saying the payment sector is just exploding in Central Asia, and he really wants his experience to benefit the whole region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, absolutely. And he sounds pretty excited about it too, saying the payment sector is just exploding in Central Asia, and he really wants his experience to benefit the whole region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The payment sector is developing at a tremendous pace in Central Asia, and I hope that my previous experience and knowledge will benefit not only the company, but also Kazakhstan and the countries of the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Yeah, I saw that quote! "Tremendous pace," he said. But, uh, what about Rafal Trepka, the previous Country Manager? Is he out?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that quote! Tremendous pace, he said. But, uh, what about Rafal Trepka, the previous Country Manager? Is he out?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The payment sector is developing at a tremendous pace in Central Asia, and I hope that my previous experience and knowledge will benefit not only the company, but also Kazakhstan and the countries of the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nah, not out at all! He's actually moving to lead Mastercard's Customer Solution Centre, which is, like, their regional hub for the CIS. So still very much in the picture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nah, not out at all! He's actually moving to lead Mastercard's Customer Solution Centre, which is, like, their regional hub for the C I S. So still very much in the picture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rafal Trepka, former Country Manager of Mastercard Central Asia, as previously announced, will focus on leading the Mastercard Customer Solution Centre, Mastercard's regional hub in the CIS region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that makes sense. So, kind of a strategic reshuffle then. Trepka even commented, saying he's confident Sanzhar will give, um, 'additional impetus' to their projects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that makes sense. So, kind of a strategic reshuffle then. Trepka even commented, saying he's confident Sanzhar will give, um, additional impetus to their projects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I am confident that Sanzhar will give additional impetus to our projects, and together we will continue to work to ensure that even more of Mastercards most advanced solutions and innovations are available in the region, making payments simple, secure and convenient.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And Suleiman Sozeri, the CEO for Mastercard in CIS, also weighed in. He's really highlighting how this expands the Customer Solution Centre, bringing in more talented specialists.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And Suleiman Sozeri, the C E O for Mastercard in C I S, also weighed in. He's really highlighting how this expands the Customer Solution Centre, bringing in more talented specialists.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the central office of the hub in Almaty, we gather a large number of strong talented specialists who work to develop the ecosystem of digital payments in all these countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it sounds like they're really doubling down on the region. Plus, Mastercard is doing a lot more than just card payments there, right? Like, supporting tourism, SMBs, even the creative industries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it sounds like they're really doubling down on the region. Plus, Mastercard is doing a lot more than just card payments there, right? Like, supporting tourism, S M Bs, even the creative industries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan Mastercard assisting the National Bank and Government of Kazakhstan in expanding payment ecosystem and promoting Kazakhstan through the Mastercard network for the further implementation of breakthrough projects in the field of tourism, carrying out programs to support micro, small and medium-sized businesses, IT exporters and the creative industry through the development of payment and digital solutions, providing expert and technological support in the development of the national payment system and the development of human capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. They're helping the National Bank, uh, with the payment ecosystem, promoting Kazakhstan. It's a big push for digital transformation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. They're helping the National Bank, uh, with the payment ecosystem, promoting Kazakhstan. It's a big push for digital transformation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan Mastercard assisting the National Bank and Government of Kazakhstan in expanding payment ecosystem and promoting Kazakhstan through the Mastercard network for the further implementation of breakthrough projects in the field of tourism, carrying out programs to support micro, small and medium-sized businesses, IT exporters and the creative industry through the development of payment and digital solutions, providing expert and technological support in the development of the national payment system and the development of human capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Zhamalov himself, he's got, like, an Executive MBA from Cambridge and a CFA. Seriously impressive background.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Zhamalov himself, he's got, like, an Executive M B A from Cambridge and a C F A. Seriously impressive background.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He holds an Executive MBA from the University of Cambridge (UK), a Master's degree in International Financial Analysis from the University of Newcastle (UK) and a BSc in Financial Mathematics from Charles University (Czech Republic). Moreover, he holds the prestigious financial certificate CFA and Certificate in Company Direction from the Institute of Directors (UK).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Oh yeah, very accomplished! So, uh, all in all, seems like a really strong appointment for Mastercard in a super important, developing market.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, very accomplished! So, uh, all in all, seems like a really strong appointment for Mastercard in a super important, developing market.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Looks like a very strategic move to keep that momentum going in Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Looks like a very strategic move to keep that momentum going in Central Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I'd say so. Good stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I'd say so. Good stuff.
